Responsibilities: Define product vision, create initial business requirements, prioritize features, and ensure the final product meets business goals. Initiate the project and conclude it with a product release announcement.
Translate business requirements into technical requirements, ensure alignment between business needs and technical solutions, and provide feedback on technical feasibility.
Design the overall software architecture, create detailed technical specifications, and guide the development process to ensure it aligns with the architecture.
Implement the software based on the technical specifications and architecture design, write clean and testable code, and address any issues raised during testing.
Create and execute test plans, perform unit and integration testing, report bugs and issues, and verify that the software meets the specified requirements.
Facilitate the development process, remove obstacles, ensure smooth communication between team members, and track project progress.
